front.title: IEEE Standard Specifications for High-Voltage (>1000 V) Expulsion and Current-Limiting Power Class Fuses and Fuse Disconnecting Switches

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Specifications for high-voltage (above 1000 V) expulsion and current-limiting type power class fuses, fuse disconnecting switches, their associated fuse links, disconnecting cutouts, and accessories for these devices are covered. All of these devices are intended for use on alternating-current distribution systems. (This standard is superseded by IEEE C37.42-2016 and supersedes IEEE C37.46-2001)
